This is a testharness.js-based test.

  assert_equals: expected "CSSMathSum" but got "CSSUnitValue"
[FAIL] Can set 'background-size' to a percent: -3.14%
  assert_equals: expected "CSSMathSum" but got "CSSUnitValue"
